tool_description: Generate Word Clouds from text. Multi color and different sizes and easily output to jpg, png or pdf.
name: Word Cloud Generator
title: Word Cloud Generator

api_list.name: Word Cloud
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wordcloudservice.p.rapidapi.com/generate_wc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordcloudservice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Word Cloud by URL
